DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation Comfilcon A Senofilcon A Lenses
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Comfilcon A Senofilcon A Lenses
DOC.detailed_description: Non-dispensing , single-masked , randomize , contralateral study compare test lens control lens . Each subject randomize wear test lens one eye control lens eye .
DOC.criteria: Subjects must satisfy follow condition prior inclusion study : Has oculovisual examination last two year Is least 18 year age full legal capacity volunteer Has read understood information consent letter Is willing able follow instruction maintain appointment schedule Is correctable visual acuity 20/30 better ( eye ) habitual vision correction Currently wear soft contact lenses least 3 day week , 8 hour day Has clear cornea active ocular disease Has wear lens least 12 hour examination Have normal eye evidence abnormality disease . For purpose study normal eye define one : No amblyopia No evidence lid abnormality infection ( e.g . entropion , ectropion , chalazia , recurrent stye ) No clinically significant slit lamp finding ( e.g . infiltrate slit lamp finding Grade 2 : corneal edema , tarsal abnormality , conjunctival injection ) . No active ocular disease ( e.g . glaucoma , history recurrent corneal erosion , cornea [ infiltrate ] , conjunctiva , lid , intraocular infection inflammation allergic , bacterial , viral etiology ) No aphakia Has prescription match available power range . Any following render subject ineligible inclusion : Greater 0.75 refractive astigmatism either eye Has never wear contact lenses Wears contact lenses extend wear basis Has systemic disease affect ocular health Is know sufferer ocular allergy Is take medication , oral antihistamine , antihistamine eye drop , oral ophthalmic betaadrenergic blocker ( e.g . Propanolol , Timolol ) , anticholinergic , oral steroid prescribe overthecounter eye medication , except artificial tear eye lubricant Has clinically significant lid conjunctival abnormality , neovascularization , corneal scar corneal opacity Is aphakic Has undergone corneal refractive surgery . Is wear monovision Is participate type clinical research study Female currently pregnant breastfeed Has > grade 1 ocular corneal stain type extent > grade 2 either type extent
